name: Bouncy Cat (Cannibalistic Tomato)
description:
My first polished game, if you can even call it that. Assets were all made by me, save for the font, and SFX. This was super fun to work on, and I'm happy I was able to finish this at all. Any and all feedback will be appreciated, although I don't intend on staying on this project for long. 

Font: "Kenney Pixel Square" by Kenney is licensed under CC0 1.0

Sound Packs used:  "SFX: The Ultimate 2017 16 bit Mini Pack" by Swiss Arcade Game Entertainment, and "Impact Sounds" and "Interface Sounds" by Kenney, are all licensed under CC0 1.0
